text: Balapan () is a rural locality (a village) in Matrayevsky Selsoviet, Zilairsky District, Bashkortostan, Russia. The population was 119 as of 2010. There are 2 streets. == Geography == It is located 62 km from Zilair, 3 km from Matrayevo. == References == Category:Rural localities in Zilairsky District
title: Balapan, Republic of Bashkortostan
